CustomPiwikJs.PluginDescription: Allows any plugin to extend the Matomo JavaScript Tracking file (piwik.js) and add new functionnality and website measurement capabilities.
CustomPiwikJs.DiagnosticPiwikJsNotWritable: The Matomo JavaScript tracker file "/piwik.js" is not writable which means other plugins cannot extend the JavaScript tracker. In the future even some core features might not work as expected.
CustomPiwikJs.DiagnosticPiwikJsMakeWritable: We recommend to piwik.js writable by running this command: %s
